text.section: With advice from the Secretary of Budget and Management and in accordance with § 15-103 of this title, the Ethics Commission shall determine whether an individual in an executive unit is a public official for the purposes of this title.

The Secretary of Budget and Management shall provide advice under subsection (a) of this section to the Ethics Commission:
annually; and
at any other time on request of the Ethics Commission.
